name: Stormy Seas V0.03
description:
The first completed prototype of my Game Development Practicum assignment. Controls are as follows:

WASD - MOVE, SPACE - JUMP, SHIFT - SPRINT

Release Notes

Description:

Stormy Seas is a simple game in which you can play through one level and collect several valuables to increase your score and progress while avoiding a hostile NPC who is chasing you.

Version: 0.03

Features Implemented:

Movement, Items and Inventory, Collectable Items, Player Attributes, Interactable NPCs, 2D Textures, HUD, Main Menu (Basic) and Levels/Scenes (1-2 maximum)

Known Bugs:

  • In the WebGL build of the game, the camera will only move as far as the mouse can move in the viewport and will not rotate further.
  • The ship and the platform are not incorporated into the AI navmesh, so they cannot climb it and instead pass straight through it.
  • The player can walk through the water with no penalty and can even keep walking until they fall off the edge of the game world.
  • The water surrounding the island in the level can sometimes appear further up than the actual water level.
  • Modern Browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.)
  • Hardware Acceleration Recommended

ReadME:

In order to launch the game, simply go to the following URL: https://valkimir.itch.io/stormy-seas-v003 and click run game.

Minimum Requirements:

Platform:

Browser (WebGL)
